name: Unpaper Towels in White Stitching, set of 10
description:
Unpaper towels are the best way to replace those waste producing paper towels. Ours, after washing, are 10.5 x 10.5, almost the exact same size as a store bought paper towel.

These are made from birdeyes cotton which become more absorbent the more you wash.

Check out our other listings for other colors available (brown is also available but not listed yet).

We can make these in bigger batches as well. Just contact us to start your custom order.

name: Breast Cancer Awareness Reusable Nursing Pads, set of 6
description:
Go green and save money by using reusable nursing pads.

Special for Breast Cancer Awareness month, these reusable nursing pads are a wonderful way to show your support.

This listing is for 3 pairs, or 6 total, reusable nursing pads.

These are 3 layers of cotton flannel with a fleece outer to protect against leaks.

We welcome custom orders so if you are looking for something different, please let us know!

Also, check out our seconds listing for nursing pads that are slightly flawed.

name: Rainbow Chevron Reusable Nursing Pads
description:
Go green and save money by using reusable nursing pads. 

These nursing pads are made of 3 layers of cotton flannel and 1 layer of fleece (for stopping leaks). You will love the feel of flannel against your skin. 

These are available in the 5 colors you see listed:

Red: 1 pair
Orange: 1 pair
Yellow: 2 pairs
Green: 1 pair
Blue: sold out

Each listing is for 1 pair of your selected color. We will combine shipping if you order more than one pair.

We welcome custom orders so if you are looking for some specific let us know and we can get started.

Also check our seconds listing for nursing pads with minor flaws on them.

name: Custom Hooded Play Capes
description:
Be a royal prince or princess....a butterfly or Little Red Riding Hood! You choose your colors/prints and we make up the perfect cape for your little one.

Cape has two hood options...rounded or pointed.

Cape closes with elastic around a button.

Available in two sizes, pictured is size small. 

This is made from cotton fabric (unless otherwise requested) and can stand up to play and washing...very important for capes!

This is a custom order. Payment is due up front but refundable for 3 days after purchase.

Custom items can not be returned. I will work closely with you on the details.
